patient_safety_activity.notes: Check ABPN Physician Portal; one-time requirement if indicated.

abcc_details.summary: Set of online article exams per active certification; complete by end of each 3-year cycle to be excused from a future 10-year exam.

activity_sources.cme_category1_scope: Any Category 1 CME relevant to oneâ€™s field of practice (need not be ABPN-approved).

clinically_active.definition: Any direct and/or consultative patient care in prior 24 months (including supervision).

clinically_active_not_enough_for_pip.definition: Primarily research/academic/administrative; insufficient to complete PIP.

clinically_inactive.definition: No clinical/consultative patient care in past 24 months.

alternative_options.fellowship_waiver: See booklet pages on CC Activity Waiver for Fellowships.

audit.audit_evidence_notes: Retain certificates and documentation (CME/SA/PIP/Patient Safety, ABCC article exams). If audited, be prepared to explain PIP process and provide improvement plan materials.

notes.one_set_for_all_certifications: A single set of CME/SA/PIP/Patient Safety activities applies across specialties/subspecialties.
notes.abcc_enrollment: Passing CC exam or completing article pathway enrolls you into CC; then satisfy activity requirements and pay annual fee on 3-year blocks.

eligible_pathways_examples: Joint Commission OPPE or Stroke Center
